screen_desc: The screenshot shows a product page on the Walmart mobile app. The product is a Logitech G PRO X SUPERLIGHT Wireless mouse, priced at $89.99. It is sold and shipped by AmzBuys and includes free shipping with an estimated arrival date of Friday, December 23. The app offers an option to add a Walmart Protection Plan by Allstate, with two plan options available. The total estimated cost is $89.99, and the app provides a promotional offer for earning 5% cash back on Walmart.com.
action_think: The user wants to view their shopping cart on Walmart and add an Acer Predator to it. The current screen shows the shopping cart page with a product listed. I need to navigate back to the search page to type in the Acer Predator product to add it to the cart.
action_plan: Navigate back to the search page
Type in the product name: 'Acer Predator'
Select the product from the search results
Add the product to the shopping cart
action_desc: Navigate back to the search page
action_result: Clicking on the search bar opened the search interface, allowing you to enter a search query. This action is a step towards finding the acer predator on Walmart, which is required to add it to the cart.
